markdownRemark.html:
“Mendicants, there are these four noble expressions. What four? Saying you haven’t seen, heard, thought, or known something, and you haven’t. These are the four noble expressions.”

AN.4.252. Tatiyavohārasutta (“Expressions, 3rd”)

children.value:
“Mendicants, there are these four noble expressions.
What four?
Saying you haven’t seen, heard, thought, or known something, and you haven’t.
These are the four noble expressions.”
